page.title: 12The Wolsingham Surgery
page.content: Medical services in Wolsingham are provided by a{group practice}which also works from a Health Centre in Stanhope,6 miles updale.The team of doctors work at varied times to fit in with night duties,holidays and consulting hours at the two surgeries. The Wolsingham{surgery}opens between 3_5pm on Monday,Wednesday and Friday and between 8.30_11am on Tuesday and Thursday.On Saturday,there is a session between 8.30 and 10am for emergencies only. The surgery employs two receptionists who file records on card and computer disc.Most people visit the doctor about the{common ailments,}such as flu, measles,arthritis and rheumatism.All serious matters and emergencies are dealt with at Bishop Auckland Hospital,12 miles away.
